sentence.Network_en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentence.Network_cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentence.Network_en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentence.Network_cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentence.Network_en: Gregory was still enchanted with Shannon's youth and joy and beauty.
sentence.Network_cn: 格雷戈里仍为香农的朝气、快乐和美丽着迷。

phrase.cizu_name: beauty is in the eye of the beholder

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)that which one person finds beautiful or admirable may not appeal to another
(proverb)a pleasing appearance is not a guide to character
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)美貌不过一张皮（喻不可以貌取人）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French beaute, based on Latin bellus 'beautiful, fine'

encyclopedia.content: n.1. 美，美丽，优美[U] He has no real feeling for beauty. 他并非真的爱美。 2. 美人；美的事物[C] She is quite a beauty. 她是个真正的美人儿。 3. 【口】极好锛埢蚣碉級的人；极好锛埢蚣碉級的事物；典型的一例[C] That black eye you got in the fight is a beauty! 瞧你被打得眼青鼻肿，真漂亮极啦！ 4. 优点；妙处[the S][(+of)] The beauty of it is that everyone can play. 它的妙处在于每个人都可以玩。 5. 【物

entry.def: Beauty is the state or quality of being beautiful.

example.tran: 自然美景美不胜收的景区

example.ex: Everyone admired her elegance and her beauty.
example.tran: 人人都羡慕她的优雅和美丽。

entry.def: A beauty is a beautiful woman.

example.ex: She is known as a great beauty.

entry.def: You can say that something is a beauty when you think it is very good.

example.ex: The pass was a real beauty, but the shot was poor.
example.tran: 传得非常漂亮，但是临门一脚太臭了。

entry.def: The beauties of something are its attractive qualities or features.

example.ex: He was beginning to enjoy the beauties of nature.
example.tran: 他开始享受大自然之美。

entry.def: Beauty is used to describe people, products, and activities that are concerned with making women  look beautiful.

example.ex: Additional beauty treatments can be booked in advance.
example.tran: 额外的美容服务可以提前预订。

entry.def: If you say that a particular feature is the beauty of something, you mean that this feature is what makes the thing so good.

example.ex: There would be no effect on animals—that's the beauty of such water-based materials.
example.tran: 对动物毫无影响——水基材料妙就妙在这儿。

means.word_mean: 1. the qualities that give pleasure to the senses
2. a very attractive or seductive looking woman
3. an outstanding example of its kind;

sentences.sentence: "when I make a mistake it's a beaut"

auth_sentence.content: Riceboy Sleeps operates at a heady level of beauty.

sentences.en: He was struck with the beauty of scenery.
sentences.cn: 他被美丽的景色迷住了。

sentences.en: She was a great beauty in her youth.

jushi.english: He was struck with the beauty of scenery.
Nobody can help stopping and admiring the unique beauty of the scene.
jushi.chinese: 人人都会情不自禁地停下来,观赏这独一无二的美景。

jushi.english: The tranquil beauty of the village scenery is unique.
jushi.chinese: 这乡村景色的宁静是绝无仅有的。
